text: Hi Guys, have any of you got any experience of using the Trujay wizard to migrate data from pipedrive to HubSpot? I have a fairly large amount of records to bring over to HubSpot, just wondering if there are any things to "watch out for" or if its a fairly painless process? Thanks in advance and apologies if this is in the incorrect Channel! Thanks, Rob

Hey everyone. Has anyone created an import process to pull content into HUBDB? I'm relatively new to HubSpot development and want to make sure this is the right approach. We have an existing external system that houses staff members and their details, and exposes them in a json feed. I would like to build an import process to pull this content into HubDB on a regular basis. I'm thinking this could be a process that runs nightly, but manually kicking off the process would work too. Once imported, I envision a module that would allow editors to curate staff lists for display on a HubSpot CMS page, so existing rows would need to be updated in HubDB, not deleted and re-added on each import. Has anyone done this type of thing? Thanks!
Is there still a limit of 10 custom objects? I'm getting close...
